title: Daniel Radcliffe & Weird Al Yankovic | Graham Ordered to Testify in Georgia; Lindell Says He's Monitoring Midterms: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Supreme Court ordering Sen. Lindsey Graham to testify in front of a grand jury for the investigation into Trump's attempt to steal votes before speaking with Daniel Radcliffe, Weird Al Yankovic and Kerry Condon and welcoming musical guest Kurt Vile & The Violators.

Then, Daniel Radcliffe and Weird Al Yankovic talk about the creation of Weird: The Al Yankovic Story, hilarious cameos from Akiva Schaffer and Jorma Taccone in the film and Weird Al's parodies boosting the sales of original songs.


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
